thread.title: Ashley Rideout
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Ashley Rideout

author: Ashley Rideout
title: Ashley Rideout
text: Devin at Skipper was very helpful in booking the hotel blocks for my wedding. She processed everything in a timely manner and even helped me add an additional hotel months after I had booked the others. I love that all of my hotel details are kept in one place and I can go back to look at the contracts whenever I need to. I will definitely use Skipper again!
